verses.text: Then all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* themselves to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* unto \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, we \add are\add* thy \w bone|strong="H6106"\w* and thy \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

And moreover in \w time|strong="H8543"\w* \w past|strong="H8032"\w*, even when \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* was \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, thou \add wast\add* he that leddest \w out|strong="H3318"\w* and broughtest \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, Thou shalt \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and thou shalt be \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* over my \w people|strong="H1571"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 11.2 \ft in time…: Heb. both yesterday and the third day\f*\f + \fr 11.2 \ft feed: or, rule\f*

Therefore \w came|strong="H0935"\w* all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* to \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*; and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with them in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and they \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*.  +  r 11.3  t by: Heb. by the hand of *

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Jebus|strong="H2982"\w*; where the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w* \add were\add*, the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jebus|strong="H2982"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, Thou shalt not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* hither. Nevertheless \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the \w castle|strong="H4686"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, which \add is\add* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Whosoever \w smiteth|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* shall be \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* and \w captain|strong="H8269"\w*. So \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and was \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*.\f + \fr 11.6 \ft chief: Heb. head\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w castle|strong="H4679"\w*; therefore they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* it the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.\f + \fr 11.7 \ft it: that is, Zion\f*

And he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, even from \w Millo|strong="H4407"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: and \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2421"\w* the \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 11.8 \ft repaired: Heb. revived\f*

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w waxed|strong="H3212"\w* \w greater|strong="H1980"\w* and \w greater|strong="H1419"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add was\add* with him.\f + \fr 11.9 \ft waxed…: Heb. went in going and increasing\f*

¶ These also \add are\add* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* whom \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had, who \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* themselves with him in his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, \add and\add* with all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to make him \w king|strong="H4427"\w*, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* concerning \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 11.10 \ft strengthened…: or, held strongly with him\f*

And this \add is\add* the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* whom \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had; \w Jashobeam|strong="H3434"\w*, an \w Hachmonite|strong="H2453"\w*, the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w captains|strong="H7991"\w*: he lifted \w up|strong="H5782"\w* his \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* against \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \add by him\add* at \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w time|strong="H6471"\w*.\f + \fr 11.11 \ft an Hachmonite: or, son of Hachmoni\f*

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him \add was\add* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dodo|strong="H1734"\w*, the \w Ahohite|strong="H0266"\w*, who \add was one\add* of the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w mighties|strong="H1368"\w*.

He was with \w David|strong="H1732"\w* at \w Pas-dammim|strong="H6450"\w*, and there the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, where was a \w parcel|strong="H2513"\w* of \w ground|strong="H7704"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*; and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.\f + \fr 11.13 \ft Pas-dammim: also called, Ephes-dammim\f*

And they \w set|strong="H3320"\w* themselves in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \add that\add* \w parcel|strong="H2513"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* it, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* \add them\add* by a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H8668"\w*.\f + \fr 11.14 \ft set…: or, stood\f*\f + \fr 11.14 \ft deliverance: or, salvation\f*

¶ Now \w three|strong="H7969"\w* of the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w captains|strong="H7218"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, into the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* of \w Adullam|strong="H5725"\w*; and the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Rephaim|strong="H7497"\w*.\f + \fr 11.15 \ft three…: or, three captains over the thirty\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add was\add* then in the \w hold|strong="H4686"\w*, and the \w Philistines’|strong="H6430"\w* \w garrison|strong="H5333"\w* \add was\add* then at \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w longed|strong="H0183"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Oh that one would give me \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w well|strong="H0953"\w* of \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*, that \add is\add* at the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*!

And the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* brake \w through|strong="H1234"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and \w drew|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* out of the \w well|strong="H0953"\w* of \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*, that \add was\add* by the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \add it\add*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add it\add* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: but \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \add of\add* it, but poured it \w out|strong="H5258"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w* it me, that I should \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H2063"\w*: shall I \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of these \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that have put their lives in \w jeopardy|strong="H5315"\w*? for with \add the jeopardy of\add* their \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* it. Therefore he \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* it. These things \w did|strong="H6213"\w* these \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w mightiest|strong="H1368"\w*.\f + \fr 11.19 \ft that have…: Heb. with their lives?\f*

¶ And \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w* the \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, he was \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w three|strong="H7969"\w*: for lifting \w up|strong="H5782"\w* his \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* against \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, he \w slew|strong="H2491"\w* \add them\add*, and had a \w name|strong="H8034"\w* among the \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.

Of the \w three|strong="H7969"\w*, he was more \w honourable|strong="H3513"\w* than the \w two|strong="H8147"\w*; for he was their \w captain|strong="H8269"\w*: howbeit he \w attained|strong="H0935"\w* not to the \add first\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.

\w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of a \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Kabzeel|strong="H6909"\w*, who had done \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w acts|strong="H6467"\w*; he \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* lionlike \w men|strong="H0739"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: also he went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* a \w pit|strong="H0953"\w* in a \w snowy|strong="H7950"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 11.22 \ft who had…: Heb. great of deeds\f*

And he \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* an \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*, a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \add great\add* \w stature|strong="H4060"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* high; and in the \w Egyptian’s|strong="H4713"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add was\add* a \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* like a \w weaver’s|strong="H0707"\w* \w beam|strong="H4500"\w*; and he went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to him with a \w staff|strong="H7626"\w*, and \w plucked|strong="H1497"\w* the \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* out of the \w Egyptian’s|strong="H4713"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* him with his own \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*.\f + \fr 11.23 \ft great…: Heb. measure\f*

These \add things\add* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, and had the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* among the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w mighties|strong="H1368"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, he was \w honourable|strong="H3513"\w* among the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*, but \w attained|strong="H0935"\w* not to the \add first\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* him over his \w guard|strong="H4928"\w*.

¶ Also the valiant \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of the \w armies|strong="H2428"\w* \add were\add*, \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w* the \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, \w Elhanan|strong="H0445"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dodo|strong="H1734"\w* of \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*,

\w Shammoth|strong="H8054"\w* the \w Harorite|strong="H2033"\w*, \w Helez|strong="H2503"\w* the \w Pelonite|strong="H6397"\w*,\f + \fr 11.27 \ft Shammoth: or, Shammah\f*\f + \fr 11.27 \ft Harorite: or, Harodite\f*\f + \fr 11.27 \ft Pelonite: or, Paltite\f*
\w Ira|strong="H5896"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ikkesh|strong="H6142"\w* the \w Tekoite|strong="H8621"\w*, \w Abi-ezer|strong="H0044"\w* the \w Antothite|strong="H6069"\w*,

\w Sibbecai|strong="H5444"\w* the \w Hushathite|strong="H2843"\w*, \w Ilai|strong="H5866"\w* the \w Ahohite|strong="H0266"\w*,\f + \fr 11.29 \ft Sibbecai: or, Mebunnai\f*\f + \fr 11.29 \ft Ilai: or, Zalmon\f*

\w Maharai|strong="H4121"\w* the \w Netophathite|strong="H5200"\w*, \w Heled|strong="H2466"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Baanah|strong="H1196"\w* the \w Netophathite|strong="H5200"\w*,\f + \fr 11.30 \ft Heled: or, Heleb\f*

\w Ithai|strong="H0863"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ribai|strong="H7380"\w* of \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, \add that pertained\add* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w Pirathonite|strong="H6553"\w*,

\w Hurai|strong="H2360"\w* of the \w brooks|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Gaash|strong="H1608"\w*, \w Abiel|strong="H0022"\w* the \w Arbathite|strong="H6164"\w*,\f + \fr 11.32 \ft Hurai: or, Hiddai\f*\f + \fr 11.32 \ft Abiel: or, Abi-albon\f*
\w Azmaveth|strong="H5820"\w* the \w Baharumite|strong="H0978"\w*, \w Eliahba|strong="H0455"\w* the \w Shaalbonite|strong="H8170"\w*,

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hashem|strong="H2044"\w* the \w Gizonite|strong="H1493"\w*, \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shage|strong="H7681"\w* the \w Hararite|strong="H2043"\w*,\f + \fr 11.34 \ft Hashem: or, Jashen\f*

\w Ahiam|strong="H0279"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Sacar|strong="H7940"\w* the \w Hararite|strong="H2043"\w*, \w Eliphal|strong="H0465"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ur|strong="H0218"\w*,\f + \fr 11.35 \ft Sacar: or, Sharar\f*\f + \fr 11.35 \ft Eliphal: or, Eliphelet\f*\f + \fr 11.35 \ft Ur: or, Ahasbai\f*
\w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w* the \w Mecherathite|strong="H4382"\w*, \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w* the \w Pelonite|strong="H6397"\w*,

\w Hezro|strong="H2695"\w* the \w Carmelite|strong="H3761"\w*, \w Naarai|strong="H5293"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ezbai|strong="H0229"\w*,\f + \fr 11.37 \ft Hezro: or Hezrai\f*\f + \fr 11.37 \ft Naarai: or Paarai the Arbite\f*

\w Joel|strong="H3100"\w* the \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, \w Mibhar|strong="H4006"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Haggeri|strong="H1905"\w*,\f + \fr 11.38 \ft the son…: or, the Haggerite\f*

\w Zelek|strong="H6768"\w* the \w Ammonite|strong="H5984"\w*, \w Naharai|strong="H5171"\w* the \w Berothite|strong="H1307"\w*, the \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w* of \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*,
\w Ira|strong="H5896"\w* the \w Ithrite|strong="H3505"\w*, \w Gareb|strong="H1619"\w* the \w Ithrite|strong="H3505"\w*,
\w Uriah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*, \w Zabad|strong="H2066"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahlai|strong="H0304"\w*,

\w Adina|strong="H5721"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shiza|strong="H7877"\w* the \w Reubenite|strong="H7206"\w*, a \w captain|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w*, and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* with him,
\w Hanan|strong="H2605"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maachah|strong="H4601"\w*, and \w Joshaphat|strong="H3146"\w* the \w Mithnite|strong="H4981"\w*,

\w Uzzia|strong="H5814"\w* the \w Ashterathite|strong="H6254"\w*, \w Shama|strong="H8091"\w* and \w Jehiel|strong="H3273"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hothan|strong="H2369"\w* the \w Aroerite|strong="H6200"\w*,

\w Jediael|strong="H3043"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimri|strong="H8113"\w*, and \w Joha|strong="H3109"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, the \w Tizite|strong="H8491"\w*,\f + \fr 11.45 \ft son…: or, Shimrite\f*

\w Eliel|strong="H0447"\w* the \w Mahavite|strong="H4233"\w*, and \w Jeribai|strong="H3403"\w*, and \w Joshaviah|strong="H3145"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elnaam|strong="H0493"\w*, and \w Ithmah|strong="H3495"\w* the \w Moabite|strong="H4125"\w*,
\w Eliel|strong="H0447"\w*, and \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w*, and \w Jasiel|strong="H3300"\w* the \w Mesobaite|strong="H4677"\w*.
